name: When Winter Ends
description:
Two strangers: 

A mysterious little girl, and a lone traveler. 

The two met unexpectedly, seeking shelter from the raging storm outside. Play as each of them to figure out their past and their wishes for the future.

Entry for the Winter VN 2021 Jam.

Tip: You can click on the other objects during the your first encounter with the characters and the point and click minigames! Who knows what you'll find!

Special Thanks to:

  • Cynimonogurui , the MVP, for Editing and Proofreading <3
  • Dillan, for beta testing.

Sound Effects from:

  • Squared (door opening and closing)
  • Yellowstone National Park sound library (hurricane vent)

Once again, I made this in like 1.5 week between work and a hectic holiday :') 

I'm personally not 100% happy with this, especially with how rushed the writing was, so I might revisit this again one day... (no promises!) I'm also thinking of adding a few minigames and expanding the story a little more, but for now,  please take this!
